title: Capstone Project - Complete Humanoid Robot System
description: The capstone project integrates all the concepts learned throughout this course to build a complete humanoid robot system. This project demonstrates how ROS 2, Gazebo/Unity, NVIDIA Isaac, Visual SLAM, Navigation 2, Vision-Language-Action systems, and LLM-based planning work together to create an intelligent, autonomous humanoid robot.
